home.title: Kassi Marvin
home.my_home_presentation_l1: I am KASSI MARVIN CLÉMENT JUNIOR, a Full-Stack Developer specializing in Angular, React Native/JS (interfaces dynamiques et responsives); Spring Boot (Java), Symfony (PHP), architectures RESTful et microservices; Git (GitHub/Bitbucket), CI/CD, méthodes Agile) et Big Data.

about.aboutme1: I am a passionate software engineer with a strong foundation in full-stack development. Currently pursuing my final year at ISCOD, I'm gaining valuable industry experience through my apprenticeship at Wisetech-eng.
about.aboutme2: My technical expertise lies in Angular development, and I'm constantly seeking new challenges to enhance my skills and contribute to meaningful projects.
